trans-unit.resname: GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Card Name
GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, equipped creatures you control have indestructible.
trans-unit.target: As long as it's your turn, equipped creatures you control have indestructible.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·2 | Maeve, Insidious Singer | Card Name
GN3·2 | Maeve, Insidious Singer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Goad target creature. Whenever that creature attacks one of your opponents this turn, you draw a card. (A goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able, until your next turn.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}: Goad target creature. Whenever that creature attacks one of your opponents this turn, you draw a card. (A goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able, until your next turn.)

trans-unit.resname: GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Name
GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: Whenever another creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Vogar dies, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: When Vogar dies, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·4 | Nogi, Draco-Zealot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·4 | Nogi, Draco-Zealot | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·5 | Imaryll, Elfhame Elite | Card Name
GN3·5 | Imaryll, Elfhame Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of other Elves you control.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of other Elves you control.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·5 | Imaryll, Elfhame Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may have Imaryll assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
trans-unit.target: You may have Imaryll assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
